item.title: Enabling Autowired for Apache CXF with Spring Boot
item.description: Bean Injection Problem Spring Context Hierarchy https://www.blackpepper.co.uk/blog/a-modular-architecture-with-spring-boot Database https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/jpa/docs/current/reference/html/#jpa.java-config @EnableJpaRepositories https://springbootdev.com/2017/11/13/what-are-the-uses-of-entityscan-and-enablejparepositories-annotations/ https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/issues/8134 @EntityScan https://raymondhlee.wordpress.com/tag/enablejparepositories
